Dear Hagop, 

 

Good morning!

 

We kindly request your assistance; we had a recent theft incident in Ralph Lauren MOE that involves a family acted as customers and took 4 items. 

 

When contacted Nasco, they mention that the claim is excluded from our policy, below details and attached policy for reference. 

Could you kindly verify and advise how to proceed further. 

 



 



 

Thanks to let us know your thoughts. 

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

Roselle Reyes

Dear Roselle,

The policy does not have cover for shoplifting.

The existing cover requires force. Sleight of hand and shoplifting is not covered in the general policy wording.

If required, you should  ask the insurer to provide the cover during the renewal.

The policy does not have cover for shoplifting.

If required, you should  ask the insurer to provide the cover during the renewal.

Best Regards,
Hagop

Dear Hagop, 

 

Thank you for your feedback and noted on the comment. 

So we won’t be able to claim the items stolen then?

 

I have another query, with the PAR policy that we have it comes with a sub-policy: Third Party Liability while we are also renewing the Public Liability. Is there any difference or the coverage is the same? And is it necessary to have both?

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

The policy does not have cover for shoplifting.

We kindly request your assistance; we had a recent theft incident in Ralph Lauren MOE that involves a family acted as customers and took 4 items.

Thanks to let us know your thoughts.

Hi Hagop, 

 

Hope you are well. 

 

We would like to seek your advice regarding our policy. We had previously requested Nasco to include coverage for sleight of hand and shoplifting in our policy before and during the renewal period in March. They mentioned that they would check with the insurer, but despite several follow-up, we have not received any updates. Now, they are saying that it will not be added. 

 

Could you please advise which policy covers sleight of hand and shoplifting, and how we should proceed further?

 

Appreciate your assistance and usual support. 

 

Best regards,
